parameters.name: AppSource
parameters.description:
The CPU allocation policy. Valid values:

*   **request**: CPU cores are allocated only when a request is initiated.
*   **always**: Fixed CPU cores are always allocated.

parameters.name: CpuStrategy
parameters.description:
The additional information that is returned. The following limits are imposed on the ID:

*   success: If the call is successful, **success** is returned.
*   An error code: If the call fails, an error code is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The SAE application type. Valid values:

*   **micro_service**
*   **web**
*   **job**

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: The number of entries to return. Valid values: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The field based on which you want to sort the returned entries.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query.
